title: Elementalist Tileset Definition File
description: A JSON schema for defining a tileset for the Elementalist game

path.description: The path to the tileset image, inside the assets directory. (e.g. 'tileset/my-tileset.png')

tileWidth.description: Width of each tile in pixels

tileHeight.description: Height of each tile in pixels

tilesetWidth.description: Width of the tileset in tiles (NOT pixels)

tilesetHeight.description: Height of the tileset in tiles (NOT pixels)

horizontalPadding.description: The number of pixels of padding between each tile in the tileset. Defaults to 1.0 if not specified.

verticalPadding.description: The number of pixels of padding between each tile in the tileset. Defaults to 1.0 if not specified.

horizontalOffset.description: The number of pixels to offset the tileset by, horizontally. Defaults to 1.0 if not specified.

verticalOffset.description: The number of pixels to offset the tileset by, vertically. Defaults to 1.0 if not specified.
